meanings.definition: (Latin) front, forehead, brow; façade, front of a building; front line of battle
meanings.english_definition: (Latin) plural of frons: front, forehead, brow; façade, front of a building; front line of battle

usage_notes.explanation: 'Frontes' is the plural form of the Latin noun 'frons'. It is not commonly used in modern English except in specific academic or historical contexts when referring to multiple fronts, foreheads, or facades.

readability_explanation.text: 'Frontes' is a Latin plural noun, rarely used in modern English outside of specialized contexts. Understanding its meaning requires knowledge of Latin. It refers to multiple fronts, foreheads, or facades. Due to its limited use, it is not part of standard English vocabulary.
